title: SMC_GroupPower (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupPower
Allows to power up all axes of a group.
Calling this function block will simply call
MC_Power
for all axes
of the group.
This function block is not tied to the state of the axis group, and
it does not influence the state of the axis group.
It can, for example, be called while the axis group is still in
state
GroupDisabled
.  After the output
Status
becomes
TRUE
,
the group state will still be
GroupDisabled
.

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
SetEnabletoTRUEto enable execution of the
function block

rows.Name: Status
rows.Comment: TRUEif axis is ready to move

rows: TRUEif execution of the function block is not finished

Signals an error occurred within the function block during
execution
